meanings.sent1: The inviters welcomed everyone to the party.
meanings.sent2: The inviters sent out invitations for the event.
meanings.sent3: The inviters decided to invite the whole neighborhood to the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: The inviters were like friendly magnets, drawing in guests from all around.
meanings.sent5: The inviters' warm smiles made their invitations irresistible.

meanings.sent1: The inviters asked their friends to join them for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The inviters were kind enough to invite us to their gathering.
meanings.sent3: The inviters playfully challenged each other to invite the most people.
meanings.sent4: The inviters' invitations were like golden tickets to a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The inviters' generosity in extending invitations knew no bounds.
